courses.title: GC-MS/MS Training
courses.subtitle: Gas Chromatography–Mass Spectrometry
courses.description: In-depth knowledge of trace-level compound identification and quantification. Widely used in food, pharmaceuticals, environment, and forensic testing.
modules: Principles of Gas Chromatography and Mass Spectrometry
Case studies: pesticide residues, pharma impurities, food adulterants
outcomes: Develop validated methods for complex samples
Interpret mass spectral data for unknown compounds
Apply GC-MS/MS in routine & research labs
targetAudience: Professionals in R&D and QC departments
courses.seoTitle: GC-MS/MS Training Course | Analytical Chemistry Training | Petrolabs
courses.seoDescription: Petrolabs offers hands-on GC-MS/MS training for students & professionals. Learn method development, data interpretation & applications in food, pharma & environment.
courses.seoKeywords: GC-MS/MS training, analytical training India, gas chromatography mass spectrometry training, pesticide residue analysis training, pharma QC training

courses.title: ICP-OES Training
courses.subtitle: Inductively Coupled Plasma–Optical Emission Spectrometry
courses.description: Equips participants with practical knowledge of elemental and trace metal analysis in diverse matrices such as water, soil, food, alloys, and fuels.
modules: Heavy metal analysis (Pb, As, Hg, Cd, Cr, etc.)
Industry applications: environment, metallurgy, food, oils
outcomes: Validate test methods as per ASTM, ISO, BIS, APHA standards
Apply ICP-OES in environmental monitoring & material testing
targetAudience: QC teams in food, pharma, metal industries
courses.seoTitle: ICP-OES Training Course | Metal & Trace Element Analysis | Petrolabs
courses.seoDescription: Petrolabs provides hands-on ICP-OES training. Learn elemental analysis, sample preparation & calibration for metals in water, soil, food & alloys.
courses.seoKeywords: ICP-OES training, elemental analysis training, trace metal analysis, inductively coupled plasma training, BIS APHA ASTM standards training

courses.title: HPLC Training
courses.subtitle: High Performance Liquid Chromatography
courses.description: Hands-on experience in separation, identification, and quantification of compounds used in pharma, food, and chemical industries.
modules: Gradient programming & detection methods (UV, PDA, FLD)
outcomes: Develop validated methods for pharma & food applications
Troubleshoot retention time shifts, peak tailing & noise issues
courses.seoTitle: HPLC Training Course | Chromatography Training | Petrolabs
courses.seoDescription: Hands-on HPLC training by Petrolabs. Learn chromatography principles, method validation, gradient programming & troubleshooting for pharma & food analysis.
courses.seoKeywords: HPLC training India, chromatography training, liquid chromatography course, pharma QC training, food testing training

courses.title: AAS Training
courses.subtitle: Atomic Absorption Spectroscopy
courses.description: Focuses on metal quantification techniques widely applied in water testing, food safety, pharmaceuticals, and petrochemical analysis.
modules: Analysis of heavy metals (Pb, Cd, Hg, Cr, Ni, Cu, Zn)
Compliance with BIS, APHA, AOAC standards
outcomes: Differentiate flame vs. graphite furnace techniques
Apply AAS in environmental & industrial testing
courses.seoTitle: AAS Training Course | Atomic Absorption Spectroscopy | Petrolabs
courses.seoDescription: Petrolabs offers AAS training with hands-on practice in elemental analysis. Learn heavy metal detection in food, water, pharma & petrochemicals.
courses.seoKeywords: AAS training, atomic absorption spectroscopy training, heavy metal analysis training, water testing training, food QC training

courses.title: GC Training
courses.subtitle: Gas Chromatography
courses.description: Introduction to Gas Chromatography (GC) for analysis of volatile and semi-volatile organic compounds.
modules: Applications: petrochemicals, flavors, fragrances, environmental pollutants
outcomes: Analyze volatile organics in environmental & industrial samples
courses.seoTitle: GC Training Course | Gas Chromatography Training | Petrolabs
courses.seoDescription: Petrolabs offers Gas Chromatography (GC) training with hands-on practice. Learn column selection, detectors, and applications in food, petrochemicals & environment.
courses.seoKeywords: GC training India, gas chromatography training, volatile compound analysis, petrochemical testing training, flavor testing training

courses.title: Chemistry Training
courses.subtitle: Analytical, Organic & Industrial Chemistry
courses.description: Practical exposure to laboratory techniques and industrial applications across analytical, organic, and industrial chemistry.
modules: Industrial Chemistry: Fertilizers, polymers, fine chemicals
outcomes: Gain hands-on skills in analytical & organic chemistry
Learn industrial chemical processes & safety standards
Prepare for roles in R&D, QC, and production
courses.seoTitle: Chemistry Training Programs | Analytical, Organic & Industrial | Petrolabs
courses.seoDescription: Petrolabs offers Chemistry training in analytical, organic & industrial fields. Hands-on exposure to spectroscopy, chromatography & chemical process labs.
courses.seoKeywords: analytical chemistry training, organic chemistry training, industrial chemistry training, laboratory skills training, GLP training
